message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I'll give you 40, you can have 60. It's a good deal!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than last round, Bob.  Let's split it 55/45.  It's still a fair deal, considering the inflation!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy! I'll take 70, you can have 30. Don't get left with nothing!
Okay, Bob. Let's compromise. 45 for me, 55 for you. It's the best we can do with the inflation hitting us both.
